ComicInfo.Summary: FeFo#77 All Color!!! In the aftermath of Capricorn's defeat, the Fearforce make a bid for escape. The new Rad and Darkfire(ever the elusive one) manage, Krone and Proxima do not, in "Aftermath", scripted by Bill Black, drawn by Mark Heike, and inked by Chris Allen and Heike. Guest starring Paragon, Commando D and General Strock. Lots of wild action, including giantess Tara versus Krone. Later, Synn's imagination takes the Femforce into an early-sixties, Lee and Kirby-style horror fantasy in "I Was Mauled By Akwaa, The Walking Wall Of Water!!!" Synn, Stardust and Too Tall Tara must defeat an old man turned into a titanic water creature by an ancient magical fluid- and see that he's not hurt in the bargain. Written by Don Secrease, wth art by Bill Lux, Bill Black, Chris Allen and Mark Heike. Fantastic GTS scenes of giant woman Tara in action against the huge Akwaa. Color cover by Bill Lux and Chris Allen, full color throughout.
ComicInfo.Title: I Was Mauled by Akwaa the Walking Wall of Water!!!; Aftermath
